place.name: ASHBY ST MARY
place.gazetteerText: ASHBY, a parish in Loddon district, Norfolk; 3 miles SW of Buckenham r. station, and 7 SE of Norwich. Post Town, Rockland under Norwich. Acres, 487. Real property, £1,360. Pop., 257. Houses, 58. The living is a rectory, annexed to the rectory of Carleton, in the diocese of Norwich. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
